title: trouble connecting?
body: I keep getting kicked from league..... first of the client is extremely slow. and i can start a game. It  just comes up with a prompt that says trying to connect. and i exit the client then i try to logging in and it says unable to connect and then i try again and it says im in queue to login. but then everything is super slow.

replies.body: There could possibly be something giving your network a hard time sending your connection to our servers. Check to see if there are any firewalls or antivirus that could be getting in the way, but also check through the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as well.
